testcase.name: Check that if user does not provide a password that is at least 6 characters long
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Amazon homepage...............................................passed When I hover over 'Hello, Sign in' button...................................passed And I click on 'Start here' link on homepage................................passed And I enter a random 'name'.................................................passed And I enter a random email address in the 'Email' field.....................passed And I enter a random five character long password in the 'Password' field...passed And I click on 'Create you Amazon account' button on the Registration page..passed Then I verify "Passwords must be at least 6 characters." is displayed under `Password` field for not meeting the password criteria.passed And I verify "Type your password again" is displayed under `Re-Enter password` field.passed
